name: Eagle Peak Summit
description: A challenging ascent to panoramic views of the Bay Area. Rocky terrain with steep sections.

name: Redwood Loop Trail
description: A serene walk through ancient redwood groves. Perfect for beginners and families.

name: Coastal Bluff Path
description: Stunning ocean views along dramatic cliffs. Watch for sea lions and migrating whales.

name: Mount Diablo Fire Trail
description: Intense climb with 360-degree views from the summit. Exposed terrain, bring sun protection.

name: Muir Woods Cathedral Grove
description: Walk among the tallest trees on Earth. Boardwalk path suitable for all skill levels.

name: Steep Ravine Trail
description: Dramatic descent through a narrow canyon with ladders and bridges. Creek crossings required.

name: Tilden Wildcat Peak
description: Popular East Bay hike with wildflowers in spring. Great for trail running.

name: Angel Island Perimeter
description: Circle the island with views of San Francisco, Alcatraz, and the Golden Gate Bridge.

name: Mission Peak
description: Iconic Bay Area challenge. Steep climb to the famous pole at the summit.

name: Lands End Trail
description: Urban escape with Golden Gate views, hidden beaches, and historic Sutro Baths ruins.

name: Point Reyes Chimney Rock
description: Windswept coastal trail perfect for whale watching. Elephant seals in season.

name: Marin Headlands Rodeo Valley
description: Gentle loop through historic military bunkers with Bay views. Dog-friendly.

name: Sunol Ohlone Wilderness
description: Remote backcountry experience. Multi-day backpacking opportunities available.

name: Tennessee Valley Beach
description: Family-friendly trail to a secluded beach. Great for sunset hikes.

name: Dipsea Trail
description: Historic race route from Mill Valley to Stinson Beach. Hundreds of stairs included.

name: Cataract Falls Loop
description: Beautiful waterfall trail best after winter rains. Slippery when wet.

name: Purisima Creek Redwoods
description: Shaded redwood forest on the Peninsula. Loop options for all abilities.

name: Black Diamond Mines
description: Explore historic coal mining tunnels and rolling grasslands. Hot in summer.

name: Almaden Quicksilver
description: Former mercury mining site with extensive trail network. Wildlife abundant.

name: Briones Peak Trail
description: East Bay hilltop with sweeping views. Green and lush in spring, golden in summer.
